568870.name: Passage 4 Demo
568870.description:
Very beautiful Christmas layout!
The legendary Christmas edition of Passage generates real Christmas spirit.

Place tiles on the board to match the color or symbol of adjacent tiles to
create 'passages' from edge to edge.
Completed rows and columns ('passages') disappear from the board.
Passage 4 is an easy to learn but challenging game that incorporates the
best elements of several classic games.
It will keep you fascinated for hours. Give it a try!

Features
- More than 40 levels
- 3 different game modes: Clear, Continue, and Classic
- 3 levels of difficulty
- Beautiful graphics in Christmas Style
- Local and global high score lists
- Great sound effects and background music
- Spoken tutorial and a detailed manual
568870.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
